Our Mission

We specialize in coordinating ground services in Makkah for Southeast Asian Umrah group operators. No fixed packages!— Just flexible, reliable support built around your group’s needs. Hotels. Meals. Transport. All locally managed, all handled with care.

Why Choose Us?

  • Based in Makkah – Local presence, fast problem-solving
  • Custom Coordination – Services adapted to your group’s needs
  • Trusted Network – Reliable hotel, food, and driver partners
Explore Our Services

Our Approach

  • We listen before we act.
  • We plan for real-world challenges.
  • We coordinate everything locally.
  • We keep you updated, always.

🏨 Group Hotel Booking

Local Rates. Guaranteed Rooms. Total Peace of Mind.

Thanks to long-standing partnerships with trusted hotels in Makkah, we secure rooms for your group at rates well below the market average. From check-in management to emergency backup plans, we make sure your accommodations are solid, smooth, and stress-free.

Click here

🍽️ Group Meal Coordination

Reliable, Halal, and Convenient – Right Where You Need It.

We operate a restaurant inside the Clock Tower complex and work closely with hotel kitchens to provide fresh, group-friendly meals. Whether you need buffet-style, packed meals, or custom timings, we make it happen on schedule, without surprises.

Click here

🚌 Group Transport Support

Comfortable, Safe, On-Demand Mobility for Your Pilgrims.

We help you source the right vehicles from vetted local rental companies – from SUVs to full-size buses. Our transport support includes route planning, timing management, and real-time updates so your group gets where they need to be, safely and on time.

Click here

Ask Anything

Frequently Asked Questions

Are you a travel agency? Do you offer full Umrah packages?

No, we are not a travel agency. We specialize in on-the-ground support services in Makkah. You handle visas, flights, and group marketing – we manage hotels, meals, and transport locally.

What services do you provide exactly?

We coordinate hotel bookings, group meals, airport transfers, local transport, and add-ons like SIM cards, Ihram kits, and Ziarah routes. All services are customizable based on your group’s needs.

Can you help us reduce ground costs for our Umrah packages?

Yes. We work with budget-friendly 2★ and 3★ hotels, trusted local restaurants, and reliable transport providers. Our local presence allows us to negotiate better rates and avoid middleman markups.

How flexible are your services?

Very flexible. We don’t sell fixed packages. You can request hotel-only, meals-only, or full support. We can also adjust services for different group sizes and special requirements.

Can you handle urgent requests or last-minute changes?

Absolutely. Since we are based in Makkah year-round, we can act quickly on the ground – from solving hotel check-in issues to arranging last-minute transport or meal changes.

Do you speak Bahasa / English / Arabic?

Yes. Our team communicates fluently in English, Arabic, and Bahasa Melayu – so coordination with Malaysian and Indonesian agencies is smooth and clear.

Do you work with groups coming via other agents or DIY teams?

Yes. We support B2B agencies as well as independent group organizers who handle their own visas and flights. As long as you need ground coordination in Makkah, we’re ready.
